src:
LIGA ŠAMPIONA TIKET 01: Vratila se!
Ponovo najjače kontinentalno klupsko takmičenje i ponovo MOZZART radi za vas

05 Nov 2019

Naokon kraćeg predaha danas se nastavljaju obračuni u Ligi šampiona, a na progarmu ovog utorka je osam susreta.
Dakle sasvim dovoljno za dva BONUS TIKETA, pa krenimo od prvog to jest od LIGA ŠAMPIONA TIKETA 01. A na njemu, po navici i tradiciji četiri para i četiri unapred određene, ali realne igre. Da ne bude zabune, tu je i povećanje ukupne kvote, ovaj put sa 13,44 na 16,00.

(1,29) BARSELONA (7,00) SLAVIJA P. (10,5)

(2,90) ZENIT (3,40) RB LAJPCIG (2,45)

(2,05) LION (3,45) BENFIKA (3,60)

(1,95) VALENSIJA (3,40) LIL (4,10)

Vaše je samo da uplatite LIGA ŠAMPIONA TIKET 01 u bilo kojoj MOZZART kladionici do 18.55, ili pak da to učinite preko naše internet stranice - mozzartbet.com.
text:
TICKET CHAMPIONS LEAGUE 01: She's back!
Again the strongest continental club competition and again MOZZART works for you

05 Nov 2019

After a short break, the Champions League fixtures continue today, with eight matches scheduled for Tuesday.
So enough for two BONUS TICKETS, so let's start with the first one, that is, the TICKET CHAMPIONS LEAGUE 01. And on it, according to the habit and tradition of four pairs and four predetermined but realistic games. Not to be confused, there is an increase in the overall quota, this time from 13.44 to 16.00.

(1,29) BARCELONA (7,00) SLAVIA P. (10,5)

(2.90) ZENIT (3.40) RB Leipzig (2.45)

(2,05) LION (3,45) BENFIKA (3,60)

(1.95) VALENCIA (3.40) LIL (4.10)

All you have to do is pay the CHAMPION TICKET 01 CHAMPIONSHIP in any MOZZART bookmaker until 18.55, or make it through our website - mozzartbet.com.
